Nerangs.ab: daitikanąmcā aidiiūnąm hiiat̰ urunō yazamaidē pad aṣ̌āunąm āat̰ urunō yazamaidē rāspīg ō ī dast ī hōy ī zōt šawišn hāwan abar griftan pad kudō.zātanąmcīt̰ zōt pārag ī zōhr andar hāwan kunišn narąmcā nāirinąmcā abarhāwan abar hāwan zanišn yaēšąm vahehīš daēnā̊ vanaiṇtī vā rāspīg hāwan abar urwēs nihišn və̄ṇghən vā abar wars-dān nihišn vaōnarə̄ andarag ī ādišt ud urwēs abar zamīg nihišn vā abar ādišt nihišn zōhr abāg gyāg kunišn zōt vaṇtąm. ...

"(The zōt should recite) daitikanąmcā aidiiūnąm hiiat̰ urunō yazamaidē and at aṣ̌āunąm āat̰ urunō yazamaidē, the rāspīg has to go to the left hand of the zōt and to take the hāwan. At kudō.zātanąmcīt̰, the zōt has to pour a drop of zōhr into the hāwan. At narąmcā nāirinąmcā, he has to hit the hāwan with the abarhāwan. At yaēšąm vahehīš daēnā̊ vanaiṇtī vā, the rāspīg has to put the hāwan on the urwēs. At və̄ṇghən vā, he has to put it ovedr the wars-dān. At vaōnarə̄, he has to touch with it the earth in the andarag between the ādušt and the urwēs. At vā, he has to touch the ādišt with it and give back the zōhr to its place (and continue with) vaṇtąm. ..."
